definitions: 掴む[つかむ] (v5m, vt) to seize, to catch, to grasp, to grip, to grab, to clutch, to hold, to catch hold of, to lay one's hands on,to obtain, to acquire, to get, to win, to capture,to understand, to grasp, to comprehend
english: Release insects and frogs by pushing [OK].
japanese: 一度[つかん]だ虫やカエルは【決定ボタン】を押すことによって手放すことができます。

english: Insects and frogs react differently depending on where you release them, so try many different places.
japanese: はなした場所によって[リアクション]が違いますのでいろんな場所でためしてください。

definitions: 靫蔓[うつぼかずら] (n) pitcher plant
薬玉[くすだま] (n) ornamental ball-shaped scent bag,decorative paper ball (for festive occasions)
食らう[くらう] (v5u, vt) to eat, to drink, to wolf, to knock back,to receive (e.g. a blow),to be on the receiving end (of something undesirable), to undergo (trouble)
勺[しゃく] (n) shaku, [object Object],shaku, [object Object]
尺[しゃく] (n) shaku (unit of distance approximately equal to 30.3 cm),rule, measure, scale,length
癪[しゃく] (n) cause of offense, cause of offence, annoyance, peeve,spasms, convulsions, cramps
杓[しゃく] (n) ladle, dipper,wild chervil (Anthriscus sylvestris), cow parsley, keck, Queen Anne's lace
笏[しゃく] (n) shaku (flat wooden or ivory baton carried in the right hand when in ceremonial imperial or Shinto garb)
酌[しゃく] (n) pouring alcohol, person pouring alcohol
爵[しゃく] (n) jue (ancient 3-legged Chinese wine pitcher, usu. made of bronze),peerage (hereditary title bestowed by the emperor)
ぶら下がる[ぶらさがる] (v5r, vi) to hang from, to dangle, to swing
english: It's a strange plant that hangs down from above. It's mouth is usually open to catch insects.
japanese: 上から[ぶら下がっ]ている不思議な植物ね。普段はフタが開いているけどあれは虫を食べるためなのよ

definitions: 取り込む[とりこむ] (v5m, vi) to take in, to bring in, to adopt (e.g. behaviour), to introduce,to capture (e.g. image), to import,to win over, to please, to curry favour with, to flatter,to defraud of, to swindle, to embezzle,to be busy, to be in confusion, to have trouble
english: When an insect gets in, it closes its mouth, trapping it. It's lid's stronger than it looks. It's big enough to hold a human. But it's really picky and spits out lots of stuff.
japanese: いったん虫を[取りこむ]とフタがしまるの。あのフタ、見た目よりも頑丈なのよ。人が乗れるくらいにね。でも好き嫌いが激しいからはきだす事もあるわ

definitions: 頑丈[がんじょう] (adj-na, n) solid, firm, stout, burly, strong, sturdy
english: When an insect gets in, it closes its mouth, trapping it. It's lid's stronger than it looks. It's big enough to hold a human. But it's really picky and spits out lots of stuff.
japanese: いったん虫を取りこむとフタがしまるの。あのフタ、見た目よりも[頑丈]なのよ。人が乗れるくらいにね。でも好き嫌いが激しいからはきだす事もあるわ

definitions: 好き嫌い[すききらい] (n) likes and dislikes, pickiness (about food), choosiness, fussiness, tastes, preferences
english: When an insect gets in, it closes its mouth, trapping it. It's lid's stronger than it looks. It's big enough to hold a human. But it's really picky and spits out lots of stuff.
japanese: いったん虫を取りこむとフタがしまるの。あのフタ、見た目よりも頑丈なのよ。人が乗れるくらいにね。でも[好き嫌い]が激しいからはきだす事もあるわ

definitions: 掃き出す[はきだす] (v5s, vt) to release, to sweep out, to clean out
吐き出す[はきだす] (v5s, vt) to vomit, to spit out
english: When an insect gets in, it closes its mouth, trapping it. It's lid's stronger than it looks. It's big enough to hold a human. But it's really picky and spits out lots of stuff.
japanese: いったん虫を取りこむとフタがしまるの。あのフタ、見た目よりも頑丈なのよ。人が乗れるくらいにね。でも好き嫌いが激しいから[はきだす]事もあるわ

definitions: 臆病[おくびょう] (adj-na, n) cowardice, timidity
english: It may not look it…or maybe it does, but this insect is really timid. If you go near it, it'll run away… If you touch it, it'll just turn in to a ball…
japanese: みかけによらず……いや、みかけ通りかな？[おくびょう]なのよ、この虫。近づくと逃げちゃうし……さわるとかたまっちゃうし……
